title: srI raguvara suguNaalaya
sahitya:
shrI raghuvara suguNAlaya (rAma) sarasija lOcana virOca nAbha

anupallavi

 tarAnalEni parAku lETiki birAna nnu brOvaga rAdA vAdA

caraNam 1

 kamalAhita nata kamalA hitadhara mamata delisi nannu manninca rAdA
   
caraNam 2

 kalasha jaladhilO lakSmitO nADE kala kAlamuna nI sEva rAjasE nA manaseringi balkuminkanu
   
caraNam 3

 kanikaramuna nanu kani karamunaniDi canuvuna oka manavini balkaga rAdA
   
caraNam 4

 Agamamula avanijAlOla vEgamE telisikO tyAgarAjArcita
